entries.text: #0Talk-1st time
Well...
You look to be Unkindled.
No bell tolls, and yet, you've slipped into the painting?
Oh, no matter.
If you've lost your way, the words of Lady Friede will guide you.
Now, go on inside. Show respect, and listen carefully.
#0Talk-1st time, after attaining 5 or more Dark Sigils
Well, well...
You're Lady Yuria's Lord of Hollows.
No bell tolls, and yet, you've slipped into the painting?
Oh, no matter.
If you've lost your way, the words of Lady Friede will guide you.
Now, go on inside. Show respect, and listen carefully.
#0Talk-2nd time
What's keeping you? Go on, right inside.
Show respect, and let Lady Friede speak to you.
#0Talk-1st time after talking to Sister Friede
Lady Friede has spoken, has she not?
Then tarry no longer and begone.
#0Talk-2nd time after talking to Sister Friede
There is one thing you should know.
Inside the cold painting, curiosity could be your cross...
Stray from the withering flame, and the snow will swallow you whole.
#0Talk-1st time after talking to Sister Friede, attaining 5 or more Dark Sigils
Lady Friede has spoken, has she not?
Then tarry no longer and begone.
Carry on, for Lady Yuria, and for Londor.
#0Upon being attacked
Why you miserable, mad Hollow.
You're nothing, without a bell to guide your way.
#0Upon being attacked, after the protagonist has attained 5 or more Dark Sigils
Why you miserable, mad Hollow.
What is Lady Yuria thinking...
#0Upon appearing after being approached & made hostile
I've seen your kind, time and time again.
Every fleeing man must be caught. Every secret must be unearthed. Such is the conceit of the self-proclaimed seeker of truth.
But in the end, you lack the stomach.
For the agony that you'll bring upon yourself...
#0Upon killing the protagonist
I trust you've learned your lesson...
Inside the cold painting, curiosity could be your cross...
#0Upon dying
Forgive me, my Lady...
I swore an oath, but I have failed you...
...Lady Elfriede...
##Now, go on ahead. Show respect, and listen carefully.
##What's keeping you? Go on, straight ahead.
##Now, go on ahead. Show respect, and listen carefully.
